name: Classic Sangrita With Orange Juice, Pomegranate, and Chili
description: Chase your high-quality sipping tequila the classic, grown-up way—with this fruity, spicy sangrita made of pomegranate, lime, and orange juices.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce (15ml) fresh or from-concentrate pomegranate juice
Pinch Pequin chili powder (you can substitute cayenne or another hot red chili powder)

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine orange juice, lime juice, pomegranate juice, sugar, and chili powder and stir until sugar is dissolved. Taste and adjust lime, sugar, chili powder, or other ingredients if desired. Chill in the refrigerator or by stirring with ice briefly and then straining. Serve in a shot glass alongside a good-quality silver tequila.
